2.name: Wish of a Snow Goddess
2.description: Milord, it's snowing... If you don't mind, come hide under my umbrella.

strengthenLevel.level10: Full Barrage I, Main Gun Efficiency +5%, Limit Break ★★★★☆☆
strengthenLevel.level30: Full Barrage II, Torpedo Efficiency +15%, Limit Break ★★★★★★

1.name: Body and Soul
1.description: Increases torpedo critical rate by 20%(40%), and critical damage by 65%

2.name: Flash of Lightning
2.description: 15% (30%) activation upon firing torpedo: launches a special barrage (damage based on skill level)

4.name: Full Barrage
4.description: Every 9 (6) shots from the main guns, triggers Full Barrage - Ibuki Class I(II)

1.chinese: 将我从亘久之梦中唤醒的是你吗？在下伊吹，虽然仍是修行之身，若不嫌弃，任凭差遣
1.chineseTL: Are you the one who awakened me from my eternal slumber? I am Ibuki, though my body is still in training, if you do not mind, please use me as you will.

2.chinese: 主上对我感到好奇吗？不过过去我不曾来到世间，也就没有值得一提的事迹……唔，喜欢和歌，擅长剑术，这样可以吗？还有……我不太习惯和人相处……
2.chineseTL: Milord is curious about me? Because I did not exist in the past I don't have any exploits worth mentioning... Uh, I like Waka and I'm adept in swordsmanship, are you satisfied with that? Also... I'm not very accustomed to interacting with people...
2.japanese: 主殿、この伊吹に興味が…？うん…一度も生まれることがなかった伊吹は、誇れるカンレキもないのは当然として……えっと、趣味は短歌で、剣術が得意です！というところでよろしいでしょうか？あ、あとは……本当は人と話すのがちょっと苦手で……
2.japaneseTL: Milord, have you taken an interest in me…? Um… Since I was never born, naturally, I don't have a history to be proud of… Erm, I compose tanka as a hobby, and I'm good at fencing! Was that introduction good enough? A-also… I'm actually not very good at talking to people…

3.chinese: 将我从亘久之梦中唤醒的是你吗？在下伊吹，虽然仍是修行之身，若不嫌弃，任凭差遣
3.chineseTL: Are you the one who awakened me from my eternal slumber? I am Ibuki, though my body is still in training, if you do not mind, please use me as you will.
3.japanese: 永き夢から私を目覚めさせたのはあなたでしょうか？ 不肖伊吹、まだ修行中の身ですが、この私でよろしければ、何卒お使いください
3.japaneseTL: Was it you who woke me up from my long dream? I am unworthy and still training, but if that is okay with you then please put me to use.

4.chineseTL: Milord, you worked hard out there.
4.japanese: 主殿、外出お疲れ様でした
4.japaneseTL: Milord, your hard work is to be commended.

5.chinese: 主上，欢迎......没有什么好招待的，只有茶可以吗？
5.chineseTL: Milord, welcome... There's nothing much to serve, are you okay with just tea?
5.japanese: 主殿、よ、ようこそ……あまり出せるものはないですが…お茶でもどうでしょうか？
5.japaneseTL: W-welcome, Milord… I don't have much to offer, but… would you like some tea?

6.chinese: 只有我和主上两个人…总觉得有点…害羞
6.chineseTL: Only the two of us, Milord and I... It still feels a little... embarrassing.
6.japanese: 主殿と二人っきり……なんだか…ドキドキ……
6.japaneseTL: Being alone with Milord… makes my heart race... a bit

7.chinese: 主上，要是暂时没有事，我能去冥想一下吗？
7.chineseTL: Milord, if you don't need me right now, may I go meditate?
7.japanese: 主殿、ご命令がなければ、瞑想に…少し席を外してもよろしいでしょうか
7.japaneseTL: Milord, if you do not need me right now then I'd like to medita-… I'd like to take my leave, if that's okay with you.

8.chinese: 为了精进剑术，每天必须至少空挥千回……请放心，在主上离开的时候我已经完成了
8.chineseTL: In order to improve swordsmanship, it is necessary to swing my sword one-thosand times daily... Please don't worry, I was done while Milord was away.
8.japanese: 剣の腕、落とさないようにするだけでも毎日素振り千回…… あ、ご安心ください！主殿がいない間に済ませてまいりました
8.japaneseTL: I swing my sword a thousand times a day to prevent my swordsmanship from worsening… Ah, please don't worry! I finished my training while you were not here, Milord.

9.chinese: 展示一下剑术吗？对不起，被人这么看着有点……
9.chineseTL: Showcase my swordsmanship? Sorry, but demonstrating in front of others is a bit...
9.japanese: 演武を披露してほしい、ですか？す、すみません、人前ではちょっと……
9.japaneseTL: Do you want me to demonstrate my martial art skills? I-I'm sorry, but I lack the confidence to demonstrate it to others…

10.chinese: 烦恼退却，六根清净……呀！主、主上……
10.chineseTL: Purge the worries, purify all senses... Ah! M-Milord...
10.japanese: ぼ、煩悩退散六根清浄……あぅ！あ、主殿……
10.japaneseTL: P-purge my sinful thoughts… Ah! Oh, Milord…

11.chinese: 有任务...需要我也一同出击吗？
11.chineseTL: There's a mission... Do you need me to sortie too?
11.japanese: 任務ですね…伊吹も一緒に出撃しましょうか？
11.japaneseTL: There's a mission… Shall I sortie as well?

12.chinese: 主上，那边好像堆了好多东西？喔，那就是奖励吗？
12.chineseTL: Milord, what is that pile of stuff over there? Oh, are those rewards?
12.japanese: 主殿、向こうに結構物資が積み上がっているようですが…あれがホウシュウ…ですか？
12.japaneseTL: Milord, there seems to be a pile of resources over there… Are those what are called… "rewards"?

13.chinese: 主上，你的信件…诶？念给你听？那种害羞的事情…
13.chineseTL: Milord, your mail... Huh? Read it for you? That's kind of embarrassing...
13.japanese: 主殿、お手紙…え？読み上げるのですか？そ、そんな恥ずかしいこと……
13.japaneseTL: Milord, there's a letter for you… Huh? Read it out loud? T-that's too embarrassing…

14.chinese: 主上，受伤了的话请用我的艾草把，我还有很多喔
14.chineseTL: Milord, if you get injured, please use some of my mugwort, I still have plenty.
14.japanese: 主殿、もし怪我していたら伊吹のヨモギを敷いてみてはどうですか？まだまだありますよ？
14.japaneseTL: Milord, if you get injured, how about applying this mugwort from Mount Ibuki? There's plenty more where it came from.

15.chinese: 主上，委托……唔，是叫这个吗？总之完成了
15.chineseTL: Master, commission... Oh, so that's what it's called? Anyway, it's completed.
15.japanese: 主殿、イタクって……これですか？はい、とにかく無事完了しました
15.japaneseTL: Milord, is this what is known as a… "commission"? Understood. Anyhow, it has been completed without issue.

16.chinese: 这就是...变强的感觉？感激不尽
16.chineseTL: This is... the feeling of becoming strong? My deepest gratitude.
16.japanese: これは…強くなった感触…感謝です！
16.japaneseTL: This is… how it feels to get stronger… You have my gratitude!

17.chineseTL: There are no emotions in a place of battle... Ibuki, sortieing!
17.japanese: 戦に情けなど無用…伊吹、参ります！
17.japaneseTL: There is no room for any mercy in battle… Ibuki, advancing!

18.chineseTL: A minor accomplishment. Hardly worth mentioning.
18.japanese: これしきの手前、褒められるほどでは御座いません
18.japaneseTL: My performance was nothing special, it does not deserve to be praised.

19.chineseTL: Uuu... I need to train twice as hard...
19.japanese: うぅ…修行を倍にするべきか……
19.japaneseTL: Uuh… I need to train twice as hard…

20.chinese: 伊吹之山岳……尽在这一剑之中
20.chineseTL: The mountain of Ibuki... Its weight is in this blade.
20.japanese: この一刀、伊吹の嶺にかけて！
20.japaneseTL: I make this slash in the name of Mount Ibuki!

21.chineseTL: To fight with the odds stacked against me... Just what I had hoped for!
21.japanese: 背水の陣……望むところです！
21.japaneseTL: Fighting with my back against the wall… Just what I was hoping for!

22.chinese: 早知会遇到你这样的人，这个世间不来也罢......
22.chineseTL: If I knew that I would meet a person like you, it would have been fine to not even come into this world...
22.japanese: 主殿のような人に仕えると知っていたら、伊吹は具現されなくても……
22.japaneseTL: If I had known that I was to serve someone like you, it would have been better if I had never been created…

23.chinese: 我喜欢在高山之上，坐看浮云悠悠的生活......不过来到这里后我知道，我也不讨厌和大家一起的生活
23.chineseTL: I enjoyed living a relaxing life on top of a mountain, watching the clouds float by... Though after coming here, I don't dislike living with everybody here.
23.japanese: 伊吹は山で暮らして、毎日雲を眺める生活も好きですけど…… ここに来てから、今の生活でも悪くないと思うようになりました
23.japaneseTL: While I liked living in the mountains and gaze at the passing clouds every day… I don't think living here is so bad either.

24.chinese: 帅气……吗？我倒是更加羡慕总是笑容满面的大家……和她们相比，我只是不知道怎么表露感情而已
24.chineseTL: I'm cool...? On the contrary, I'm the one who admires everyone else with their faces always full of smiles... Compared to them, I just don't know how to express my own feelings.
24.japanese: カッコイイ……ですか？伊吹はむしろ笑顔にあふれるみんなのほうが羨ましいです。 ……伊吹は、みんなと比べて感情を表すすべがわからないだけ……
24.japaneseTL: You think I'm… "cool"? I am simply jealous of everyone's bright smiles. I just don't know how to express my feelings as well as everyone else…

25.chinese: 而且和大家相处之后我才更加体会到，想要正确地表达自己的想法是一件很难的事，比如说喜悦，比如说……爱慕
25.chineseTL: After interacting with everyone, I realized that expressing your feelings correctly is difficult. For example, happiness, or ...adoration.
25.japanese: みんなと一緒に生活してようやく気づきました。 自分の気持ちを正しく表すのは難しいと…。「楽しい」とか……「恋」とか……
25.japaneseTL: After living here with everyone I've finally come to realize how difficult it is to correctly express my feelings… Feelings like "fun"… or "love"…

26.chinese: 伊吹山的艾草，常被用来比喻安静燃烧的恋心，就好比现在…指挥官能感觉到吗？伊吹的…心
26.chineseTL: The mugwort of Mount Ibuki is often used as a metaphor for the quiet burning of love, just like right now... Commander, can you feel Ibuki's... heart?
26.japanese: 伊吹山、ヨモギの恋は静かに燃ゆる――た、例えば今…主殿、伊吹の心…感じて…いますか？
26.japaneseTL: On Mount Ibuki, the mugwort's love quietly burns. S-say… Milord, can you feel… my heart?

27.chinese: 我过去从不知道，心意得到回应，是一件这么幸福的事情…请不要看我，主上…我现在的表情一定很奇怪…
27.chineseTL: Back then, I never knew that having my feelings reciprocated would be something so joyous.... Please don't look at me, Master... My expression right now must be really weird...
27.japanese: 自分の気持ちが報われるのは、こんなに嬉しいことなんて……主殿、み、見ないでください ……今の伊吹は嬉しすぎて、きっと顔がヘンになってますから……
27.japaneseTL: I did not know that having my feelings reciprocated would bring such joy… Milord, p-please don't look… I'm so happy right now that I must have a weird expression on my face…

28.chinese: 主上，我听说这是赠与重要之人巧克力的节日…对我来说，这是第一次过情人节，也是第一次做的巧克力…今后，还会和主上一起度过许多“第一次”吧。如果这也能成为主上一段难忘的回忆..就好了
28.chineseTL: Milord, I heard this is a holiday when you give chocolate to your most important person... This is my first time celebrating Valentines and the first time I crafted chocolate... From now on, there will be still lots of "first times" with Milord. I hope I can ingrain this unforgettable memory into Milord...
28.japanese: 主殿、バレンタインでは大切な方にチョコを贈るものと聞きました…。初めてのバレンタイン、初めてのチョコ。これからも主殿とたくさんの「ハジメテ」を過ごすのでしょう。主殿にとっても大切な思い出になれば……うれしいです
28.japaneseTL: Milord, I heard that Valentines is when you give chocolate to your most precious person... First Valentines, first chocolate. From now on, there will a lot of "first times" with Milord. I will be happy if... this can become an unforgettable memory to Milord.

1.chinese: 主上，下雪了呢……不介意的话，请来伊吹的伞下躲一躲吧。
1.chineseTL: Milord, it's snowing... If you don't mind, come hide under my umbrella.

3.chinese: 这一身衣服，不好好感谢凤翔小姐可不行
3.chineseTL: I'm very grateful to Houshou for these clothes

4.chinese: 阿嚏！……打喷嚏的样子很可爱？请、请不要笑话我了……
4.chineseTL: Achoo!... my sneezing face is very cute? P-please don't make fun of me...

5.chinese: 这就是真正的雪……真漂亮啊
5.chineseTL: So this is real snow... it's very beautiful

6.chinese: 冬天会有很热闹的祭典吗……稍微……有些感兴趣
6.chineseTL: There are lively festivals during winter?... I'm slightly... interested

7.chinese: 主上……有想去的地方了？我会陪您一起去的
7.chineseTL: Milord... is there somewhere you want to go? I'll go with you

9.chinese: 外面在下雪呢……主上，我给您再添一件毛衣吧
9.chineseTL: It's snowing outside... Milord, I'll prepare a wool sweater for you

10.chinese: 在永梦之中，冬天的安静的，冰冷的。但在这里，在主上身边，冬天依然是温暖的……主上，我能和您……牵手吗？
10.chineseTL: In my unending dreams, winter was quiet and cold. But here next to Milord, even though it's winter it's still warm... Milord, may I... hold hands with you?
